metadata.title: Infoblox-IPAM-Lookup
metadata.description: The playbook will retrieve IP entities from an incident, call an API to obtain IPAM lookup data, and add this data, along with IP space and subnet information, as a comment on the incident.
prerequisites: 1. User must have a valid Infoblox API Key.
postDeployment: **a. Assign Role to add comment in incident**
1. Go to Log Analytics Workspace → <your workspace> → Access Control → Add
3. Assignment type: Job function roles -> Add 'Microsoft Sentinel Contributor' as a Role
4. Members: select managed identity for assigned access to and add your logic app as member
1. In Microsoft sentinel, analytical rules should be configured to trigger an incident which has Entities Mapping available for IP.
2. To manually run the playbook on a particular incident follow the below steps:
a. Go to Microsoft Sentinel -> <your workspace> -> Incidents
c. In the right pane, click on Actions, and from the dropdown select the 'Run Playbook' option.
d. Click on the Run button beside this playbook.

metadata.description: Please do not keep 'Playbook Name' parameter empty, else you will receive validation failure
Enter Base URL for your Infoblox instance. (e.g. https://csp.infoblox.com)

runError.message: No IPs found associated with incident.

body.message: Comment limit to an incident has been breached.
No IPAM Lookup Results Found For IP: @{items('For_Each_IP_Address')?['Address']}

inputs.name: error_message_ip_space
inputs.value: IP Space API request failed with status code:@{outputs('HTTP_Request_To_Lookup_Information_For_An_IP_Space_')['statusCode']}  and error message: @{body('HTTP_Request_To_Lookup_Information_For_An_IP_Space_')}

inputs.name: error_message_subnet
inputs.value: IP Space API request failed with status code:@{outputs('HTTP_Request_To_Lookup_Information_For_Subnet')['statusCode']}  and error message:@{body('HTTP_Request_To_Lookup_Information_For_Subnet')}

inputs.name: html_table_record
inputs.value:
IPAM Lookup For IP:@{items('For_Each_IP_Lookup_Result')?['address']}
Address@{items('For_Each_IP_Lookup_Result')?['address']}
DHCP Client HostName@{items('For_Each_IP_Lookup_Result')?['dhcp_info']?['client_hostname']}
DHCP Client Mac Address@{items('For_Each_IP_Lookup_Result')?['dhcp_info']?['client_hwaddr']}
DHCP Fingerprint@{items('For_Each_IP_Lookup_Result')?['dhcp_info']?['fingerprint']}
Host@{items('For_Each_IP_Lookup_Result')?['host']}
Tags@{variables('human_readable_tags')}
Comment@{items('For_Each_IP_Lookup_Result')?['comment']}

inputs.name: error_message
inputs.value: IPAM API request failed with status code:@{outputs('HTTP_Request_To_Lookup_Information_About_An_IP_Address')['statusCode']}  and error message:  for ip @{items('For_Each_IP_Address')?['Address']}
